name: Power Cadets
description:
Take To The Skies And Demolish Infinite Numbers Of Spaceships And Space Stations. But Be Carful If You Exhaust Your Power Cells More Enemies Will Come To Find You!

To Play (Use Fullscreen) :

WASD or Up, Down, Left, Right to maneuver your ship.

Move your mouse to aim.

Use the Left Mouse Button or Ctrl to fire!

Made for the Mini Jam 73 - Theme: Power - Limitation: Only 5 Colors

Features:

- One Whole Song

- 30 Colors Included With New Color Changing Technology
